name: Shuko Sun: A Lucidity Holo-Novel
description:
When an eccentric scientist goes missing, it's up to you and your crew to pilot an experimental spaceship to a distant star system to find him.  But to complete your mission, you'll have to face nightmarish creatures, conquer unique space dangers, and maybe even start a war.  

This alpha build will take you into the first chapter of a Holo-Novel which tells an immersive story that puts you in the Captain's Chair as you unravel the mysteries of Shuko Sun!

Note: game is still in development, a new open alpha is coming soon.
